config.bubble.itemCycleTime.name: Bubble item cycle time
config.bubble.itemCycleTime.tooltip:
Time (in seconds) for which each item in a grouped machine display will be displayed for.
For example, will be used if you have two Mushroom Boxes ready with a different mushroom each.
